verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne paadeda nityamu paadeda Prabhuvaa neeku stuti paadedan{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}నే పాడెద నిత్యము పాడెద ప్రభువా నీకు స్తుతి పాడెదన్{/lang-tel}
{lang-hin}मैं गाऊँगा, हर समय गाऊँगा, प्रभुजी स्तुति तेरी करूँगा{/lang-hin}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manchi kaapari neevaitivi gorrela koraku Praana mitchitivi paapapu paatranu neeve Thraagitivi rakshana paatranu naa kosagitivi Harshinchi prabhu paadedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Goppa kaaparivi thodai yunnaavu prati Avasaratal theerchu chunnavu naa praanamunaku Sedanu deerchi marana loyalo thodai Yunduvu yaatralo paaduchu velledanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Atmala kaapari satyavantudavu gorre Llannitiki kaapari neevai dweshinchedavu Donga kaaparulan nee gorrelu nee swaramunu Vinunu hrudaya poortigaa paadedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pradhaana kaapari prema mayudavu thwaragaa Neevu prathyaksha mouduvu mahima kireetamu Naa kosagedavu parama nagara mandu Nannunchedavu elugethi prabhu paadedanu{/lang-eng}
